name: TopG Coin
description: What Is TopG Coin (TOPG)? TOPG is a utility token built on the Binance Smart Chain, inspired by the famous saying “Top G”. The token is designed to capitalize on the hype behind this saying, while creating methods for holders to earn passive income through crypto. * Earn TOPG through 5% redistribution on all transactions * Post-to-earn platform allowing holders to be rewarded in crypto for submitting promotional videos (coming soon) * Stake tokens and earn rewards through our TOPG staking platform (coming soon) How Many TOPG Coins Are There in Circulation? TOPG launched its pre-sale on August 5th, 2022 with 1 billion TOPG tokens in circulation and LP tokens being locked for 365 days. Who Are The Founders of TOPG? TOPG’s founder has been an active crypto investor for around 5 years now, and was previously on the marketing team for a successful crypto charity project, ElonGate, with over a $300M market cap at its peak. The founder started his appearance on social media back in 2018 on YouTube and actively works with influencers to help launch their own custom Web 3.0 products. The founder is also currently the owner of multiple e-commerce brands, which advertise their products through social media. Where Can I Buy TopG Coin (TOPG)? NEAR is currently available for trading on PancakeSwap and has plans to grow its reach by listing on various other exchanges in the future.
